name: Poolviewer
tagline: Opensource data viewer for Swimovate Poolmate swimming watches.
body:
# PoolViewer #
Cross platform driver, downloader and viewer for [Swimovate](http://www.swimovate.com/) [PoolMate](http://www.swimovate.com/poolmatepro.html) swim watches for Linux and Windows.

Uses [Qt](http://qt.nokia.com/products/) and [libusb](http://www.libusb.org/wiki/libusb-1.0).

# Documentation #
Overview of the user interface [Overview.pdf](files/Overview.pdf)

# Screenshots #
![](images/main1.png)

# Releases #
The current released version is v0.5.

Binary builds for Windows can be found on the releases page. [Releases](https://github.com/ihewitt/poolviewer/releases)

Build packages for Linux are available for OpenSuse, Fedora and Ubuntu on the OpenSuse build service. [OBS](http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/ivorhewitt:/poolsync/)

# Source code #
[https://github.com/ihewitt/poolviewer](https://github.com/ihewitt/poolviewer)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
